entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Atlin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:08 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -31.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Teslin Airport 09:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -31.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 64.4 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -34.3°C
Wind: ENE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
